|brand = Minnowboard.org |model = MinnowBoard MAX |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = A2 |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 2017/01/08 |page_start_origon = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/other/other_minnowboardmax |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Atom;E3825; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.333 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = Quad SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;N25Q064A; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Kingston;D2516EC4BXGGB; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8111GS;RTL8111GS-CG; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Coreboot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = microSDHC, USB 2.0, USB 3.0, SATA2 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = Positive
|serial = yes,, 6-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, Micro HDMI 1.4a, I2C, SPI, UART, GPIO |addchip = SMBUS Advanced Power Controller;Nuvoton;NCT3012S;;1;,,, 1+1 Voltage Regulator for IMVP-7/VR12 CPUs;Intersil;ISL95837;;1;,,, HDMI Companion Chip w/ I2C Level Shifting Buffer;TI;TPD12S016;;1;,,, 2 Channel 1A USB Power Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2066;;1;,,, 4-Channel ESD Protection for USB 3.0;TI;TPD4EUSB30;;1;,,, 4-Channel ESD Solution for USB;TI;TPD4S012;;2;,,, 6-Channel (qSPI) 1/2 Multiplexer and Demultiplexer;TI;TS3A27518E;;1;,,, 2-Kbit Serial I2C Bus EEPROM;STMicroelectronics;M24C02;;1;,,, 5A Low Dropout Linear Regulator;Anpec;APL5912;;1;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;Anpec;APL5933;;2;,,, 500mA LDO Regulator;OnSemi;NCP606;;1;,,, 24V, High Current Synchronous Buck Converter w/LDO;MPS;NB670;;1;,,, 24V, High Current Synchronous Buck Converter w/LDO;MPS;NB675;;1;,,, Asymmetric Dual N-Channel MOSFET;ON Semi;FDMS3660S;;2;,,, Low-Capacitance 6-Channel ESD-Protection;TI;TPD6E001;;1; Low-Capacitance 2-Channel ESD-Protection;TI;TPD2E001;;1; 4-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Shifter;TI;TXS0104E;;8;,,, 2-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;TI;TXS0102;;2;,,, Low-Power Single Buffer Gate;TI;SN74AUP1G34;;1;,,, Single Schmitt-Trigger Inverter;TI;SN74LVC1G14DBVR;;2;, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = CircuitCo |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 07/2014 |estprice = 140 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00R5CGDWK |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = USA
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Intel Atom]]'' Dual-Core (@1.33GHz) :GPU: Intel HD Graphics *Memory: 2GB DDR3L SDRAM *Storage: 8MB Quad SPI Flash, :TF card (max.32GB)/MMC card, SATA 2 port *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port, 1x USB 2.0 port *Power: 5V, 2.5A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *https://elinux.org/Minnowboard:MinnowMax *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2014/04/01/minnowboard-max-intel-bay-trail-i-soc/ ''MinnowBoard MAX Development Board Powered by Intel Bay Trail-I SoC'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/intel-unveils-tiny-x86-minnowboard-max-open-sbc/ ''Intel unveils tiny $99 MinnowBoard Max open SBC'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/other/other_minnowboardmax |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/minnowboard/minnowboard-max |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = x86 |subtarget = 64 |arch = x86_64 |support_started_version = 19.07.0 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
